title: Hawaii: the 50th state
brief_description: Describes the birth of the Hawaiian Islands and the creation of their spectacular land forms. Shows views of the still-active volcanoes on the island of Hawaii and the silent craters of Maui. Includes scenes of the city of Honolulu and of sugar and pineapple plantations.
